sub_title: Green Hydrogen | Energy Systems |  Steel Authority of India Limited | TU Delft | SVNIT
summary: Siddharth Kalra is an experienced Mechanical Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the heavy industry and energy research. As a line manager, he successfully combined his strong technical skills with a flair for people management. He has been involved with enterprises across the spectrum of business sizes and legal structures (from startups to large enterprise). Siddharth's excellence in professional and academic work has been recognised via various awards and medals throughout his life. An avid reader, in his leisure time, Siddharth generally spends his time understanding and knowing more about the world around him or with his family and friends.

treasury_media.title: Battolyser Systems announcing Siddharth Kalra
treasury_media.description: Siddharth Kalra works as the Business Analyst for Battolyser Systems and joined the team in August 2021. He is our "swiss army knife" employee but primarily evaluates the business cases and analyses our markets....

treasury_media.title: ‘I don’t have that ‘9 to 5’ mentality’
treasury_media.description: Doing an interdepartmental thesis, more than double the required coursework, an international internship and a start-up: master’s student Siddharth Kalra is a busy man.

awards.title: Absolute Victor
awards.description: Absolute Victor of Worldwide AstroRelay Star Challenge Space Olympiad (2011), an international Space Olympiad, organized by ROSKOSMOS (Russian Federal Space Agency) and UNESCO. Award included a 11-day tour of Moscow and Baikonur, also covering Star City and Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center, Opportunity to witness the launch of manned Soyuz Mission to International Space Station from Baikonur and observation of the launch spot.

* A novel way of heating of CDQ Chambers after cold start of CDQ systems. 
* Threefold reduction in start-up time requirement and cost savings of about 15 million rupees per annum.

projects.title: Solar Desalination Plant
projects.description:
Associated with the 100000 litres per day solar desalination demonstration plant. During the attachment period : 

*Conducted experiments to ascertain the rate of copper corrosion and rate of steam generation at particular pressure and temperature.
* Equipment handled : Multi Stage Flash Steam Distillation column, IR Heaters, Blowers, High Temperature Resistant Pumps, Insulations and Materials like Bison Panel, Acrylic, Steels (MS and SS), and Copper tubings

profile_positions.description:
* Driving development of new product line and setting product targets
* Market analysis (hydrogen, electricity, raw material requirements and EU ETS) 
* Market Intelligence (Competitive analysis and policy)
* Support on subsidy applications and fundraising activities
* Analysing customer value proposition for on-grid and off-grid archetypes
profile_positions.title: Product Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Employee #2 at Battolyser Systems. As the Business Analyst for Battolyser Systems, donned several hats on the job. Highlights include :  
* Owner of the business case model (Python-based)
* Market analysis (electricity and hydrogen)
* Budget estimation for subsidies (MOOI, TKI etc.) 
* Strategy
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Founder of the student entrepreneurship project, "Rocknroo" that started with EIT Health supported Health Business Development Lab. 

Key deliverables : 
* Conducted preliminary market validation
* Quantified the market potential for the product
* Developed aspects of business model (product pricing, Go-to-market strategy, ownership and revenue models)
* Established Product lifecycle costs
* Financial projections and forecasting (capital requirements, spending, revenue growth etc.)
* Developed expected Balance Sheet, P&L statement and Cashflow statements
profile_positions.title: Founder | Chief Finance and Business

profile_positions.description:
Contracted to solve pertinent client issues with bucket elevators. 

* Developed and delivered model for estimating design parameters based on bucket geometry, belt characteristics and conveyed material. 
* Integrated the model into client's system
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The work was related to Project DEEPER, a research project between Processium and other consortium partners. The project is aimed for the efficient designing of industrial chemical processes and their integration.

During the attachment period, key tasks accomplished :

* Performed sanity check and improved the methodology for shortcuts of three separation technologies (Distillation, LLE & Filtration)
* Developed algorithms and coded Java-based GUI prototypes 
* Ensured the fit between the product and the needs of the process engineers
profile_positions.title: Innovation Intern

profile_positions.description:
Member of the Board of Student Association for the Department of Process and Energy (P&E) under Mechanical Engineering in TU Delft. 

*Facilitated and organised networking events between the students and industry. 
*Communicated with various personnel in industry and inside the University to organize company visits in Canada (provinces of Ontario and Quebec) for 15 students from Process & Energy Department. The job also entailed taking care of logistics, boarding and lodging of the students.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Thoroughly enjoyed working as a frontline manager at Bhilai Steel Plant, the flagship unit of  Steel Authority of India, India’s largest steel maker. Some of the highlights include :

*As part of commissioning team of the first Coke Dry Quenching (CDQ) units of Bhilai Steel Plant involved with :
- Acceptance testing 
- Integrated system testing
- Performance Guarantee testing

*As Shift Incharge (Operation and Maintenance) : 
- Ensured reliable and safe operations for production of 0.4 million tonnes per annum (MTPA) of high pressure steam and 0.8 MTPA of cold metallurgical coke.
- Handled daily breakdown/preventive maintenance 
- Assisted in two capital repairs
- Coordinating with multiple departments and agencies. 
- Man management and mentoring of multi-generational team of 30 diploma engineers.
*Realised annual repeatable savings of 2.5 million USD via process innovations.
*Active participant and promotor of Employee Suggestion Scheme.
*Equipment handled: Multistage pumps, Compressors, Flash tanks, Deaerators, Valves, Tubes, Oil/phosphate pumps, Steam traps, Gas lines, Refractory.
*Core Competencies: Boiler operations and maintenance, Maintenance planning and scheduling. Water & Steam chemistry
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager

profile_positions.description:
The key responsibilities included :
*Organization of program at city level and coordinating with the national level.
*Promotion of Rio +21 IYWC Program and regular end-to-end follow-ups until the end of the national program.
*Selection of Campus Ambassadors.
profile_positions.title: Rio+21 City Ambassador

profile_positions.description: First employee on the business side of the early startup stage of SlideRule (now known as Springboard). Carried of various tasks ranging from marketing strategy, analytics and search engine optimization.
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Analytics Intern

*Attended the Kodaikanal Summer School in Physics and Astrophysics.

"GPU Programming for Calculation of Travel Times of  Acoustic Waves on Sun using Time-Distance Helioseismology Technique".
profile_positions.title: Summer Research Intern

profile_positions.description:
* Responsible for all the Sports activities of Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT). 
*Organised "IGNIS", the first All India Engineering Sports Festival in March 2012. Around 1000 students from 22 colleges participated in the 3 day fest. 
*Organised Inter National Institute of Technology Tournament was organized in February 2012.
*Organised Intra-College Tournaments in Badminton, Football, Table Tennis, Basketball, and Chess.
profile_positions.title: Student Council Member (Joint Sports Secretary)

volunteer_experiences.description:
One of the select few to be granted privilege rights of Reviewer and Rollbacker of Wikipedia. 
*Responsible for undoing problematic edits and ensuring edits don't contain vandalism, violations of Wikipedia policy or inappropriate content. 
*6000+ edits to date.

*Conducted “3 Day Educational Summer Camp” and “Follow-up sessions” at 10 villages around Ujjain.
*Involved in “Data Stratification and Analysis Work” related to the “Library Programme” of Eklavya Foundation.
